name: Hortilharia
description:
Game developed for Global Game Jam 2023.

"Hortilharia" is a Multiplayer battle between carrots and radishes with action and fun. All in their "roots"? Prepare... Fertilize... ATTACK!

  • Alan Araya
  • Ilson Buss
  • Jeferson B L Correa
  • Felipe Passos
  • Yan Dias
  • Gabriel Carmo
